law.catch_line: On review of the study required under § 2-1207 of this subtitle, and the report required under § 2...
law.text: On review of the study required under § 2-1207 of this subtitle, and the report required under § 2-1209 of this subtitle, the General Assembly may act to maintain, revise, or eliminate the 25% greenhouse gas emissions reduction required under this subtitle.
